Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student is likely able to draw a basic representation of two students with a string connecting them, indicating the idea of a string telephone.
The student might include simple shapes to represent cups at the ends of the string, showing an emerging understanding of the device components.
The student may attempt to illustrate sound traveling along the string using simple lines or arrows but might not label them.
CANNOT: The student may not accurately depict the importance of the string being taut for sound transmission *(string might appear loose or sagging)*.
The student is unlikely to label or detail features that indicate how the string telephone solves the problem of distance communication *(might not include notes or explanations)*.
The student might not clearly show how the device uses sound to communicate, possibly omitting or incorrectly showing sound waves *(misunderstanding of sound wave concept)*.
